mapper.sql: SELECT ri.rfq_no, ri.item_seq, ri.pr_no, ri.pr_item_seq, ri.item_nm, ri.item_cd, ri.cls_cd, ri.size_nm, ri.model_nm, ri.dlv_loc, To_date(ri.dlv_req_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dlv_req_ymd, ri.mk_comp_nm, ri.unit_cd, ri.plan_unit_prc, ri.qty FROM agt_rfqitem ri
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agt_rfqitem ( rfq_no, item_seq, pr_no, pr_item_seq, item_nm, item_cd, cls_cd, size_nm, model_nm, mk_comp_nm, dlv_loc, dlv_req_ymd, unit_cd, plan_unit_prc, qty ) VALUES ( #{rfqNo}, #{itemSeq}, #{prNo}, #{prItemSeq}, #{itemNm}, #{itemCd}, #{clsCd}, #{sizeNm}, #{modelNm}, #{mkCompNm}, #{dlvLoc}, To_char(#{dlvReqYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{unitCd}, #{planUnitPrc}, #{qty} )
